item.description:
Third Annual Progress Toward Winning the War on Cancer
When: Tuesday, February 8 from 1:00 p.m. to 7:00 p.m.
Where: Merck Research Laboratories Boston
33 Avenue Louis Pasteur
Boston, MA
Contact: Christopher Thomas at 508-270-4830
The third annual Progress Toward Winning the War on Cancer is a symposium presented by the American Cancer Society and MassBio. Through this unprecedented partnership among academic, nonprofit, and life sciences sectors, the Cancer Research Challenge presents an unparalleled opportunity to create visible connections between science, medicine, and patient health, and to accelerate the pace of progress in conquering cancer. Poster session opportunities are available.
item.name: Third Annual Progress Toward Winning the War on Cancer
